hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Dhar:The Mu'adh-dhin (call-maker) of the Prophet (ﷺ) pronounced the Adhan (call) for the Zuhr prayer but the Prophet said, "Let it be cooler, let it be cooler." Or said, 'Wait, wait, because the severity of heat is from the raging of the Hell-fire. In severe hot weather, pray when it becomes (a bit) cooler and the shadows of hillocks appear

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِبْرَادِ بِالظُّهْرِ فِي شِدَّةِ الْحَرِّ
chapter.eng-name: In severe heat, offer Zuhr prayers when it becomes (a bit) cooler
